metadata.name: PUA - Crassus Execution
metadata.comment: Detects Crassus, a Windows privilege escalation discovery tool, based on PE metadata characteristics.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\crassus.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('crassus.exe') AND contains(lower(device.desc), lower('crassus')))

output.summary: Detects Crassus, a Windows privilege escalation discovery tool, based on PE metadata characteristics.
